TestCase.name: testDefault
TestCase.Resource: SELECT `X` AS `A`, `B` AS `B`, `C` AS `C`, `D`, 'mixed-Case string', `UNQUOTEDCAMELCASEID`, `quoted id` FROM (SELECT * FROM `T` WHERE `X` = `Y` AND `A` > 5 GROUP BY `Z`, `ZZ` WINDOW `W` AS (PARTITION BY `C`), `W1` AS (PARTITION BY `C`, `D` ORDER BY `A`, `B` RANGE BETWEEN INTERVAL '2:2' HOUR TO MINUTE PRECEDING AND INTERVAL '1' DAY FOLLOWING)) ORDER BY `GG`

TestCase.name: testCase
TestCase.Resource: CASE WHEN 1 = 2 + 3 THEN 4 WHEN 1 = CASE WHEN `A` = `B` THEN `C` ELSE `D` END THEN 6 ELSE 7 END

TestCase.name: testIndent8
TestCase.Resource: indentation=8

SELECT `X` AS `A`, `B` AS `B`, `C` AS `C`, `D`, 'mixed-Case string', `UNQUOTEDCAMELCASEID`, `quoted id` FROM (SELECT * FROM `T` WHERE `X` = `Y` AND `A` > 5 GROUP BY `Z`, `ZZ` WINDOW `W` AS (PARTITION BY `C`), `W1` AS (PARTITION BY `C`, `D` ORDER BY `A`, `B` RANGE BETWEEN INTERVAL '2:2' HOUR TO MINUTE PRECEDING AND INTERVAL '1' DAY FOLLOWING)) ORDER BY `GG`

TestCase.name: testClausesNotOnNewLine
TestCase.Resource: SELECT `X` AS `A`, `B` AS `B`, `C` AS `C`, `D`, 'mixed-Case string', `UNQUOTEDCAMELCASEID`, `quoted id` FROM (SELECT *FROM `T` WHERE `X` = `Y` AND `A` > 5 GROUP BY `Z`, `ZZ` WINDOW `W` AS (PARTITION BY `C`), `W1` AS (PARTITION BY `C`, `D` ORDER BY `A`, `B` RANGE BETWEEN INTERVAL '2:2' HOUR TO MINUTE PRECEDING AND INTERVAL '1' DAY FOLLOWING)) ORDER BY `GG`

TestCase.name: testSelectListItemsOnSeparateLines
TestCase.Resource: SELECT `X` AS `A`, `B` AS `B`, `C` AS `C`, `D`, 'mixed-Case string', `UNQUOTEDCAMELCASEID`, `quoted id` FROM (SELECT * FROM `T` WHERE `X` = `Y` AND `A` > 5 GROUP BY `Z`, `ZZ` WINDOW `W` AS (PARTITION BY `C`), `W1` AS (PARTITION BY `C`, `D` ORDER BY `A`, `B` RANGE BETWEEN INTERVAL '2:2' HOUR TO MINUTE PRECEDING AND INTERVAL '1' DAY FOLLOWING)) ORDER BY `GG`

TestCase.name: testSelectListExtraIndentFlag
TestCase.Resource: SELECT `X` AS `A`, `B` AS `B`, `C` AS `C`, `D`, 'mixed-Case string', `UNQUOTEDCAMELCASEID`, `quoted id` FROM (SELECT * FROM `T` WHERE `X` = `Y` AND `A` > 5 GROUP BY `Z`, `ZZ` WINDOW `W` AS (PARTITION BY `C`), `W1` AS (PARTITION BY `C`, `D` ORDER BY `A`, `B` RANGE BETWEEN INTERVAL '2:2' HOUR TO MINUTE PRECEDING AND INTERVAL '1' DAY FOLLOWING)) ORDER BY `GG`

TestCase.name: testKeywordsLowerCase
TestCase.Resource: select `X` as `A`, `B` as `B`, `C` as `C`, `D`, 'mixed-Case string', `UNQUOTEDCAMELCASEID`, `quoted id` from (select * from `T` where `X` = `Y` and `A` > 5 group by `Z`, `ZZ` window `W` as (partition by `C`), `W1` as (partition by `C`, `D` order by `A`, `B` range between interval '2:2' hour to minute preceding and interval '1' day following)) order by `GG`

TestCase.name: testParenthesizeAllExprs
TestCase.Resource: SELECT `X` AS `A`, `B` AS `B`, `C` AS `C`, `D`, 'mixed-Case string', `UNQUOTEDCAMELCASEID`, `quoted id` FROM (SELECT * FROM `T` WHERE ((`X` = `Y`) AND (`A` > 5)) GROUP BY `Z`, `ZZ` WINDOW `W` AS (PARTITION BY `C`), `W1` AS (PARTITION BY `C`, `D` ORDER BY `A`, `B` RANGE BETWEEN INTERVAL '2:2' HOUR TO MINUTE PRECEDING AND INTERVAL '1' DAY FOLLOWING)) ORDER BY `GG`

TestCase.name: testOnlyQuoteIdentifiersWhichNeedIt
TestCase.Resource: SELECT X AS A, B AS B, C AS C, D, 'mixed-Case string', UNQUOTEDCAMELCASEID, `quoted id` FROM (SELECT * FROM T WHERE X = Y AND A > 5 GROUP BY Z, ZZ WINDOW W AS (PARTITION BY C), W1 AS (PARTITION BY C, D ORDER BY A, B RANGE BETWEEN INTERVAL '2:2' HOUR TO MINUTE PRECEDING AND INTERVAL '1' DAY FOLLOWING)) ORDER BY GG

TestCase.name: testDamiansSubqueryStyle
TestCase.Resource: SELECT `X` AS `A`, `B` AS `B`, `C` AS `C`, `D`, 'mixed-Case string', `UNQUOTEDCAMELCASEID`, `quoted id` FROM ( SELECT * FROM `T` WHERE `X` = `Y` AND `A` > 5 GROUP BY `Z`, `ZZ` WINDOW `W` AS (PARTITION BY `C`), `W1` AS (PARTITION BY `C`, `D` ORDER BY `A`, `B` RANGE BETWEEN INTERVAL '2:2' HOUR TO MINUTE PRECEDING AND INTERVAL '1' DAY FOLLOWING)) ORDER BY `GG`

TestCase.name: testCase2
TestCase.Resource: CASE WHEN 1 = 2 + 3 THEN 4 WHEN 1 = CASE WHEN `A` = `B` THEN `C` ELSE `D` END THEN 6 ELSE 7 END

TestCase.name: testBetween
TestCase.Resource: `X` NOT BETWEEN SYMMETRIC `Y` AND `Z`

TestCase.name: testCast
TestCase.Resource: CAST(`X` + `Y` AS DECIMAL(5, 10))

TestCase.name: testOverlaps
TestCase.Resource: (`X`, `XX`) OVERLAPS (`Y`, `YY`) OR `X` IS NOT NULL

TestCase.name: testUnion
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM `T` UNION SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM `U` UNION SELECT * FROM `V`) UNION SELECT * FROM `W` ORDER BY `A`, `B`

TestCase.name: testMultiset
TestCase.Resource: VALUES ROW(MULTISET ((SELECT * FROM `T`)))

TestCase.name: testInnerJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM `X` INNER JOIN `Y` ON `X`.`K` = `Y`.`K`

TestCase.name: testWhereListItemsOnSeparateLinesOr
TestCase.Resource: SELECT `X` FROM `Y` WHERE `H` IS NOT NULL AND `I` < `J` OR (`A` OR `B`) IS TRUE AND `D` NOT IN (`F`, `G`) OR `X` <> `Z`

TestCase.name: testWhereListItemsOnSeparateLinesAnd
TestCase.Resource: SELECT `X` FROM `Y` WHERE `H` IS NOT NULL AND (`I` < `J` OR (`A` OR `B`) IS TRUE) AND (`D` NOT IN (`F`, `G`) OR `V` <> (`W` * `X` + `Y`) * `Z`)
